meanings.def: to improve the quality of something, often by adding something to it
examples: The study of science has enriched all our lives.
Reading good literature can enrich all our lives.
The educational experience of the group is enriched by contact with Spanish speakers.

meanings.def: to improve the quality of food by adding vitamins or nutrients
examples: Most breakfast cereals are enriched with vitamins.

meanings.def: to make somebody/something rich or richer
examples: a nation enriched by oil revenues
He used his position to enrich himself.
